title: sci-fi/techno
content:
Hello, looking for help with this font..  
i could swear I’ve seen it before but  
didn’t see it over at Dafont.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ats.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706104335/http:/typophile.com/files/ats.gif) | 3.09 KB |

 [‹ Hancock (the movie)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706104335/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45130 "Go to previous forum topic") [Anyone know this monospace? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706104335/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45136 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Plan B

comments.content:
Hi,  
I just wanted to let you know that in Firefox the only  
thing I see as an attachment is a black rectangle...

Patty
And I’m in Safari and only see a black rectangle.

Here it is with the color table fixed.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706104335im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ats_5374.gif)

Wow, I’m sorry about that, I must have pasted it into the wrong window.  
Thanks for fixing it! ^^
